overview: Dr. David Almagor is a veteran high-tech executive with over 25 years of experience in managing complex R&D as well as business entities, guiding them from startup inception to business success. He was the founding CEO and Chairman of Mysticom Semiconductor, a network IC provider that he had founded in 1997 that was sold to Transwitch (NASDAQ: TXCC) in 2005. Earlier, David was the DSP Technology Group Director at National Semiconductor. Dr. Almagor is an author of more than 40 publications and a co-author of 4 US patents. He holds a Ph.D. EE and M.S.EE from the University of California, San Diego and a B.S.EE from the Technion, Israel Institute of Technology.
